version_description:
- Green rank weapons can now be enhanced to +15
- Correction of descriptions and security systems.

Added global chat, now the chat window consists of 4 tabs, 
- General-without a filter, messages are sent to the Mir channel.
- Room-connected players.
- World - only filtering around the world.
- Clan - added previously.
Changing the enchantment for items of the gray and blue ranks:
The grey rank can be improved to +5, with a 100% chance of improvement.
The blue rank can be improved to +10, the chance of improvement is 85%, in case of failure, the improvement progress is not reset.
All items that have a level of improvement higher than

Changes to class abilities. now the ability increases up to level 90. Increased mana gain depending on the character level. The feature points limit is now 50 and +2 free points are awarded for raising the level.

Improved client performance.
Ability to change your nickname.
The detail setting applies to certain effects and characters.

New ability has been added to the Bishop class - "Salvation".
The main drop from normal mobs and elite is returned, as well as the chance of relatively old versions is increased.
